    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.pi4j.component.ObserveableComponentBase

        listeners

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GpioSensorComponent(GpioPinDigitalInput pin)
      default constructor; using this constructor assumes that: (1) a pin state of HIGH is SENSOR CLOSED (2) a pin state of LOW is SENSOR OPEN
      GpioSensorComponent(GpioPinDigitalInput pin, PinState openState, PinState closedState)
      using this constructor requires that the consumer define the SENSOR OPEN and SENSOR CLOSED pin states

    • Method Summary

      • GpioSensorComponent

        public GpioSensorComponent(GpioPinDigitalInput pin,
                           PinState openState,
                           PinState closedState)
        using this constructor requires that the consumer define the SENSOR OPEN and SENSOR CLOSED pin states
        Parameters:
        pin - GPIO digital input pin
        openState - pin state to set when SENSOR is OPEN
        closedState - pin state to set when SENSOR is CLOSED
